description: Developed by Highlander, China is ready to come up with the first underwater data center. The primary aim behind the experiment lies in the reduction of heat and promoting a cooler impact by exploiting the ocean currents.
title: China Commences The Underwater Data Center To Foster Energy-Efficiency

description: ESA’s New Norcia 3 antenna in Western Australia boosts global deep-space communication. The €62.3 million project will support missions like Hera and Juice while enhancing cooperation with Australia, NASA, and ISRO, ensuring broader coverage for interplanetary spacecraft.
title: ESA Expands Deep Space Network with New Australian Antenna

description: A McGill-led study warns that rising sea levels could endanger more than 100 million buildings across the Global South, with coastal infrastructure in Africa, Southeast Asia, and the Americas most at risk. The findings highlight the urgent need for emissions cuts and coastal adaptation.
title: Over 100 Million Buildings Worldwide Could Face Flooding Risk From Rising Seas, Study Warns

description: China has launched CHIEF1300, the world’s largest centrifuge, capable of generating 300 times Earth’s gravity on 22-ton loads. Housed in Hangzhou, the facility enables research in geology, oceans, and materials, simulating disasters and extreme environments. Scientists say it will serve as a global hub for advancing engineering and frontier science.
title: China Debuts ‘World’s Mightiest’ Centrifuge Hitting 300 Times Earth’s Gravity

description: Game of Glory is an upcoming reality game show which will be hosted by Abhishek Malhan. The game will feature over 100 content creators battling to win the title of Ultimate Creator.
title: Game of Glory OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Jolly LLB 3, the much-awaited legal comedy-drama directed by Subhash Kapoor, stars Akshay Kumar, Arshad Warsi, Saurabh Shukla, and Huma Qureshi. Released in theatres on September 19, 2025, the film will stream on JioHotstar and Netflix.
title: Jolly LLB 3 (2025) OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed Online: What You Need to Know About Akshay Kumar and Arshad Warsi Starrer Movie

description: Mirai is a Teja Sajja and Manoj Kumar Manchu starrer Telugu movie that follows the story of a warrior who is set to protect the nine scriptures, when eyed by a devil to attain immortality.
title: Mirai OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Written and directed by Pankaj Verma, Soch Toh Parey is a Punjabi romance drama movie starring Dheeraj Kumar and Isha Rikhi in the lead roles. The plot follows a couple navigating their relationship through conflicts, misunderstandings, and challenges.
title: Soch Toh Parey OTT Release: When and Where to Watch This Punjabi Romance Movie Online?

description: Swiss firm Panatere has inaugurated two solar furnaces to recycle steel offcuts from the watchmaking industry. Using concentrated sunlight, the system melts waste metal into reusable steel. The initiative aims to produce 1,000 tonnes of green steel annually, promoting a sustainable circular economy in Switzerland’s precision manufacturing sector.
title: Swiss Solar Furnaces Recycling Watchmakers’ Waste Metal

description: The Game: You Never Play Alone is a Tamil web series that stars Shraddha Srinath in the lead role. It follows the theme of cyber attack and addiction.
title: The Game: You Never Play Alone Streaming Now on Netflix: What You Need to Know?

description: Telugu thriller Tribanadhari Barbarik, directed by Mohan Srivatsa and starring Sathyaraj, streams on Sun NXT from October 10, 2025. Blending mythology with contemporary themes, the film has received a mixed reception.
title: Tribanadhari Barbarik OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Telugu Thriller Online?

description: The Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 has moved into its “Diwali Special” phase. With the festival just around the corner, the e-commerce giant is offering major discounts on a wide range of products — from smartphones and laptops to smart TVs and home appliances. Shoppers can also find attractive deals on 32-inch smart TVs from brands like Samsung, LG, TCL, and Xiaomi.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on 32-inch Smart TVs During Amazon's Diwali Special Sale

description: Amazon's Great Indian Festival Diwali Special Sale is ongoing in India, offering discounts on electronics, home appliances, and a wide range of laptops. Cardholders of Axis Bank, Bobcard, IDFC First Bank, and RBL Bank can get a 10 percent instant discount, including bonuses, up to Rs. 65,000, valid until October 12. Shoppers can also use exchange offers, EMI options, and coupons to save more. Here we highlight deals on beginner-friendly gaming laptops.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Discounts on Gaming Laptops for Beginners from Acer, Dell, HP and More

description: EA has confirmed the global release timings for Battlefield 6. The game will launch on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X on October 10. Battlefield 6 will kick off its first season on October 28, adding a new map, a new mode, and new weapons.
title: Battlefield 6 Global Release Timings Revealed, Pre-Loading Now Available

description: The HMD Touch 4G will launch in India on October 7 as “India’s first hybrid phone,” bridging feature phones and smartphones. Leaked images show the device in cyan and grey shades with a 3.2-inch touchscreen, a metal unibody design, and dual SIM support. It will likely feature a single rear camera with flash, a selfie camera, and a touch-sensitive home button. The phone may include a headphone jack, fast charging adapter, data cable, and a clear jelly case.
title: HMD Touch 4G India Launch Date Set for October 7; Design, Key Features Leaked

description: Huawei Mate 80 series is believed to hit shelves soon. The company is yet to confirm its existence, but ahead of it, alleged renders of the phones have leaked online. The renders suggest a revamped circular camera module on the Huawei Mate 80 Pro, signaling a departure from the previous generation’s design language.
title: Huawei Mate 80 Series Alleged Hands-on Images Suggest Refreshed Camera Module

description: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G will launch in India on October 11. It is teased to go on sale via Amazon in Moonlight Silver and Sapphire Black shades. It is confirmed to feature a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display and a a triple rear camera setup. It has IP54 rating for dust and splash resistance and measures  7.5mm in thickness.
title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G India Launch Date, Amazon Availability Announced: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Flipkart Big Bang Diwali Sale will begin in India on October 11. Flipkart Plus and Black members will get early access to the sale. The online marketplace has partnered with SBI Card to offer instant discounts on eligible purchases. There will be exchange offers and no-cost EMI options as well. The end date of the sale is not confirmed yet.
title: Flipkart Diwali Sale 2025 Date Announced; Flipkart Black, Plus Members to Get Early Access

description: Flipkart Festive Dhamaka Sale 2025 began two days after the Big Billion Days Sale 2025 concluded. The current sale event is giving people the opportunity to buy a range of electronics, like phones, smart TVs, true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets, home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, and laptops at a discount. People who are looking to buy a MacBook Air with the M2 processor can get it under Rs. 64,000.
title: Flipkart Sale 2025: Apple’s MacBook Air With M2 Chip to Be Available for Less Than Rs. 64,000

description: Instagram has rolled out its Map feature in India, allowing users to share their last active location with selected friends or groups and explore location-tagged posts, Reels, Stories, and Notes. Available on iOS and Android, the feature lets users customise sharing, block certain areas, or turn it off entirely, with parents managing supervised teen accounts. Updates include clear indicators for active sharing, removal of profile photos over tagged content, educational reminders, and a preview option showing how posts appear on the Map, enhancing transparency and user control.
title: Instagram Map Feature Rolling Out in India Alongside Privacy Tools: Here's How It Works

description: Flipkart Festive Dhamaka Sale 2025 kicked off on October 4. While the sale is live, customers have the opportunity to buy various electronics such as phones, smart TVs, true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets, home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, and laptops at discounted prices. The company has also listed Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) under Rs. 15,000. Launched in 2022, it offers a Personalised Spatial Audio feature.
title: Flipkart Diwali 2025: AirPods Pro 2 Price in India Drops Under Rs. 15,000

description: India-born global impact leader Kunal Sood has launched AudacityAI during the 80th United Nations General Assembly (UNGA). Announced at the Audacity UNGA 100 Disruptors Summit, the initiative aims to align artificial intelligence (AI) systems with human values. It seeks to guide AI through principles like compassion, service, and purpose to ensure technology benefits society.
title: Kunal Sood Launches AudacityAI at UNGA as a Framework to Ground AI in Human Values: Report

description: During the Amazon Great Indian Festival Diwali Special sale, Axis Bank, BOBCARD, IDFC First Bank, and RBL Bank card users can get a 10 percent discount, including bonus offers, up to Rs. 65,000. The offer is valid from October 6, midnight, to October 12, 11:59 pm IST, on all categories with a minimum order value of Rs. 75,000. Base and Bonus Discounts can be availed up to 10 times on Credit Card EMI and Non-EMI transactions.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Diwali Special Now Live: Here Are Updated Bank Offers and More

description: Apple's Tim Cook on Sunday remembered Steve Jobs, the tech giant's founder and former CEO, on his 14th death anniversary, saying that he saw the future as a "bright and boundless place". Cook added that his predecessor showed the path for the company to follow. Jobs was responsible for setting the design philosophy for the company's devices, including the iPhone, iPad, and iPod. He founded Apple with Steve Wozniak and Ronald Wayne. The company's first product was called the Apple I.
title: Commemorating Steve Jobs, 14 Years On: 5 Facts About the Man Behind Apple

description: NASA’s online presence has gone dark as a U.S. budget lapse forces a government shutdown. Outreach, research, and grant work have stopped, while critical ISS and planetary defense operations persist. The silence recalls 2013’s shutdown, which caused widespread delays to missions and scientific projects.
title: NASA Shuts Down Public Communications on Website Amid US Budget Impasse

description: Ubisoft has shared a teaser for Assassin's Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory update. The free DLC will get a full reveal on October 6. The expansion will be set in 9th century AlUla, an ancient Arabian oasis city. Assassin's Cree Mirage was released in 2023 on PC, PlayStation and Xbox platforms.
title: Ubisoft Shares First Look at Assassin's Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory Update; Full Reveal Set for October 6

description: Tilly Norwood, an AI-powered digital avatar created by Particle6, has sparked a major debate between Hollywood and Silicon Valley over the role of artificial intelligence (AI) in entertainment. Unveiled at the Zurich Film Festival, Norwood attracted interest from talent agents, prompting backlash from actors and unions who fear AI could replace human performers in films and television.
title: Who Is Tilly Norwood? Five Things to Know About the AI ‘Actress’ Sparking Debate in Hollywood

description: Xiaomi 17T Pro has reportedly showed up on the IMEI database and the listing mentions the model numbers and possible launch timeline of the device. The new Xiaomi 17T Pro could launch in February next year alongside the standard Xiaomi 17. They could succeed the Xiaomi 15T series. The Xiaomi 17T could run on MediaTek Dimensity 8500 chipset, while the Pro model could feature a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 processor.
title: Xiaomi 17T Pro Reportedly Listed on IMEI Database Hinting at Early Launch

description: Bitcoin hovered around $124,000 on Monday after briefly crossing $125,500 over the weekend, taking the crypto market to fresh highs. Ethereum traded above $4,500, supported by strong ETF inflows of $4.5 billion (roughly Rs. 39,906 crore) and rising institutional demand. Analysts noted Bitcoin’s market cap touched $2.5 trillion (roughly Rs. 2,21,70,000 crore), while broader macroeconomic tailwinds and declining exchange supply added to optimism. Altcoins like Solana, XRP, and Dogecoin showed mixed moves.
title: Bitcoin Price Drops to $124,000 After Hitting New All-Time High

description: OnePlus has announced the launch date for its new Android 16-based operating system. Dubbed OxygenOS 16, it will introduce a suite of artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled features. On top of this, it will also bring freshly designed app icons and other user interface elements. OnePlus recently announced that it will integrate Google's Gemini generative AI models with OxygenOS 16 to allow users to execute tasks directly on their handsets.
title: OxygenOS 16 Launch Date Confirmed; New OnePlus AI Features Expected to Debut With OnePlus 15

description: A leaked live image and official-looking render of the Realme GT 8 Pro reveal two variants of its interchangeable camera islands, designed in collaboration with Ricoh. The phone will feature a 200-megapixel Samsung HP5 periscope telephoto camera, and is expected to be accompanied by a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-808 main sensor with OIS, and a 50-megapixel Samsung JN5 ultrawide lens. It is confirmed to include a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip and a 2K 144Hz LTPO OLED display.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Spotted in Hands-On Image; Said to Feature 200-Megapixel Telephoto Camera

description: A security vulnerability has been discovered in the Unity Game engine, affection games and apps on Unity versions 2017.1 and later across Windows, Linux, Android, and macOS. Unity has issued fixes and has urged developers to deploy update patches, recompile, and republish their applications. The company said the vulnerability had not yet been exploited.
title: Unity Discovers Security Vulnerability in Game Engine, Asks Developers to Take 'Immediate Action'

description: OpenAI’s long-rumoured AI device, developed in collaboration with former Apple design chief Jony Ive, is reportedly facing delays due to mounting technical and infrastructure challenges. While the hardware side of the project is progressing smoothly, a report suggests that software development and compute limitations are proving to be major hurdles, potentially pushing the launch timeline beyond 2026.
title: OpenAI and Jony Ive’s Secretive AI Device Reportedly Hit by Software and Infra Troubles

description: Realme, OnePlus, iQOO and Xiaomi are preparing to unveil flagship devices powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. A new leak has suggested the camera specifications of these phones. Three of the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5-powered smartphones could get 50-megapixel primary rear cameras with a 1/1.5-inch sensor. The remaining one is said to pack a 50-megapixel camera with a larger 1/1.3-inch sensor.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro, iQOO 15, OnePlus 15 Camera Details Leaked Ahead of Launch in China

description: iQOO could be gearing up to bring the iQOO Neo 11 smartphone to the market. While the Vivo sub-brand is yet to confirm the handset, a new leak discloses its key specifications. The iQOO Neo 11 is said to come with notable upgrades over its predecessor. It is tipped to feature 2K resolution display.
title: iQOO Neo 11 Key Specifications Leaked; Could Feature Snapdragon 8 Elite Chipset, 7,500mAh Battery

description: Motorola's Moto G06 Power India launch date has been announced. The upcoming Moto G06 Power will feature a 6.88-inch 120Hz display with Gorilla Glass 3 protection, a MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme SoC, and Moto Gestures support. It will include a 50-megapixel rear camera, an 8-megapixel front camera, stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos, and a 7,000mAh battery. The handset will have an IP64 dust and splash-resistant design, a vegan leather finish, and Pantone-verified colour options.
title: Moto G06 Power India Launch Date Announced; Key Features, Flipkart Availability Confirmed

description: Oppo Reno 15 series display sizes recently surfaced online. In September, the Chinese smartphone maker launched the Reno 14 5G Diwali Edition with a temperature-sensitive colour-changing rear panel. Now, the chipset, camera, and battery specifications of the handset have leaked. On top of this, the lineup is said to have entered the testing phase in the global markets, including India, hinting at its imminent launch in the country.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series Key Specifications and India Launch Timeline Leaked

description: Apple’s leadership shuffle continues to make headlines as speculation grows over who will succeed Tim Cook as CEO. With Cook turning 65 next month and former COO Jeff Williams no longer in the running, Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman reports that Apple’s Hardware VP John Ternus has emerged as the leading contender for the top role.
title: Who Will Be Apple’s Next CEO After Tim Cook? John Ternus Could Reportedly Take Charge

description: The OnePlus 15 is set to launch in China this October, the company has confirmed. A new report suggests that the upcoming flagship will feature the largest battery ever on a OnePlus smartphone and include wireless charging support. While the global launch is rumoured for November 13, OnePlus is yet to make it official.
title: OnePlus 15 to Reportedly Carry the Largest Battery on a OnePlus Smartphone
